tool_description: API that provides all information related to every Super Bowl throughout the event's history
name: Super Bowl Data
title: Super Bowl Data

api_list.name: AllSuperBowlData
api_list.description:
1) All winning and losing teams from 1967 until 2023
2) All event venues, cities and states where games occurred from 1967 until 2023
3) All winning and losing team coaches from 1967 until 2023
4) All winning and losing teams' scores from 1967 until 2023
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://super-bowl-data.p.rapidapi.com/AllSuperBowlData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "super-bowl-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://super-bowl-data.p.rapidapi.com/AllSuperBowlData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "super-bowl-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
